mapper.select: SELECT /* boardList */ A.US_ID, A.BO_NUM, A.BO_TITLE, A.BO_CONTENT, A.BO_VIEW, A.BO_LOCK, A.BO_REPLY, B.US_NICKNAME FROM BOARD A JOIN US B ON A.US_ID = B.US_ID WHERE A.BO_STATE = "upload" ORDER BY A.BO_NUM DESC LIMIT #{pageStart},#{pageSize}
SELECT /* boardCount */ COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BO_STATE ="upload"

SELECT /* myBoardList */ A.US_ID, A.BO_NUM, A.BO_TITLE, A.BO_CONTENT, A.BO_VIEW, A.BO_LOCK, A.BO_REPLY, B.US_NICKNAME FROM BOARD A JOIN US B ON A.US_ID = B.US_ID WHERE A.US_ID = #{userVO.us_id} AND A.BO_STATE = "upload" ORDER BY A.BO_NUM DESC LIMIT #{cri.pageStart},#{cri.pageSize}
SELECT /* myBoardCount */ COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE US_ID= #{us_id} AND BO_STATE ="upload"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /* boWrite */ BOARD (BO_TITLE, BO_CONTENT, US_ID, BO_LOCK) VALUES (#{bo_title}, #{bo_content}, #{us_id}, #{bo_lock})
mapper.select: SELECT /* boRead */ A.US_ID, A.BO_NUM, A.BO_TITLE, A.BO_CONTENT, A.BO_STATE, A.BO_VIEW, A.BO_LOCK, A.BO_REPLY, B.US_NICKNAME FROM BOARD A JOIN US B ON A.US_ID = B.US_ID WHERE A.BO_NUM = #{bo_num}
mapper.update: UPDATE /* boViewUp */ BOARD SET BO_VIEW = BO_VIEW + 1 WHERE BO_NUM = #{bo_num}
UPDATE /* boDelete */ BOARD SET BO_STATE = "delete" WHERE BO_NUM = #{bo_num}
UPDATE /* boUpdate */ BOARD SET BO_TITLE = #{bo_title}, BO_CONTENT = #{bo_content}, BO_LOCK = #{bo_lock} WHERE BO_NUM = #{bo_num}
